title: Anno 1800: Complete Edition – v9.2.972600 + 10 DLCs + Bonus Content

Repack Features

  • Based on Anno.1800.Digital.Deluxe.Edition-EMPRESS ISO release: emp-anno1800.iso (36,101,623,808 bytes)
  • Game version is v9.2.972600; 10 DLCs and bonus content are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (ONLY when installed with all components)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus content (OST + ArtBook), unnecessary videos (credits + unused files) and voiceover packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 33.6 to 17~22.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-30 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 59.3 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Anno 1800 – Lead the Industrial Revolution!

Welcome to the dawn of the Industrial Age. The path you choose will define your world. Are you an innovator or an exploiter? A conqueror or a liberator? How the world remembers your name is up to you.

In Anno 1800, players will take charge of their own fortune as they navigate the rapidly evolving technological landscape and malicious political arena of the 19th century in their quest to build an empire that will reach from the smog-filled cities of Europe to the teeming jungles of South America.

Combining beloved features with innovative gameplay, Anno 1800 is the beginning of a new era for the Anno franchise as players leave their mark on a crucial moment in human history.

Included DLCs

  • Deluxe Pack (The Anarchist + Bonus Content)
  • Amusements Pack
  • Holiday Pack
  • City Lights Pack
  • Sunken Treasures
  • Botanica
  • The Passage
  • Seat of Power
  • Bright Harvest
  • Land of Lions

Please note, that while this edition is officially called “Complete Edition”, Season Pass 3 is already announced.
